TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GenericXmlSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

summary.span: 表示以 XML 為基礎的安全性權杖。

span.span: Represents a security token that is based upon XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您透過網路接收並未定義於規格中的權杖，或是無法決定安全性權杖的型別時，就會使用 類別。Use the class when you receive a token over the wire that is not defined in a specification or there is no way for you to determine the type of the security token. 例如在聯合服務案例中，當您將要求安全性權杖 (Request Security Token，RST) 傳送至安全性權杖服務 (Security Token Service，STS) 時，您並不一定會知道 STS 傳回的安全性權杖類型。For example, in a federation scenario when you send a Request Security Token (RST) to a Security Token Service (STS) you do not always know the type of the security token returned by the STS. 在這種情況中，您可以使用 ，將安全性權杖以及其內部與外部參考儲存為 XML。In such cases, you can use a to store the security token as XML along with its internal and external references. 當內建的其中一個安全性權杖不敷使用時，就會使用 類別定義使用 XML 的宣告。Use the class to define claims using XML when one of the built-in security tokens does not suffice. 其他安全性權杖可以自己定義使用 XML 的宣告，但是 安全性權杖通常會允許安全性權杖擁有一組應用程式定義的 XML 集合。Other security tokens can define their claims using XML, however the security token generically allows a security token to have an application-defined set of XML.

MemberSignature.Value: public GenericXmlSecurityToken (System.Xml.XmlElement tokenXml, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken proofToken, DateTime effectiveTime, DateTime expirationTime, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause internalTokenReference, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause externalTokenReference, System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> authorizationPolicies);

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 `internalTokenReference` 參數是 `null` 時，就會為這個安全性權杖建立 金鑰識別碼子句，並且設定為 屬性。When the `internalTokenReference` parameter is `null`, a key identifier clause is created for this security token and set to the property. 當您在聯合案例中取得 時，證明權杖會包含為用戶端所加密的金鑰。When the is obtained in a federation scenario, the proof token contains the key that is encrypted for the client.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProofToken As SecurityToken

summary.span: 取得安全性權杖的證明權杖。

span.span: Gets the proof token for the security token.

value.span: ，表示安全性權杖的證明權杖。

span.span: A that represents the proof token for the security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 證明權杖是一個安全性權杖，而 安全性權杖的要求者會在取得 安全性權杖時使用這個證明權杖來進行驗證。The proof token is the security token that the requester of the security token used for authentication in obtaining the security token.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SecurityKeys As ReadOnlyCollection(Of SecurityKey)

summary.span: 取得與證明權杖相關聯的密碼編譯金鑰。

span.span: Gets the cryptographic keys associated with the proof token.

value.span: 型別為 的 ，其中包含與證明權杖相關聯之金鑰的集合。

span.span: A of type that contains the set of keys associated with the proof token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以藉由取得 屬性，取得此證明權杖。The proof token can be obtained by getting the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TokenXml As XmlElement
public: property System::Xml::XmlElement ^ TokenXml { System::Xml::XmlElement ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與安全性權杖相關聯的 XML。

span.span: Gets the XML that is associated with the security token.

value.span: ，表示與安全性權杖關聯的 XML。

span.span: An that represents the XML that is associated with the security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性權杖是可以擴充的，所以 XML 中實際包含的項目會依應用程式而有所不同。The security token is extensible, so exactly what is contained within the XML is application-dependent.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ValidFrom As DateTime
public: virtual property DateTime ValidFrom { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個安全性權杖有效的第一個瞬間。

span.span: Gets the first instant in time at which this security token is valid.

value.span: ，表示這個安全性權杖有效的第一個瞬間。

span.span: A that represents the first instant in time at which this security token is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 和 屬性，即可判定 權杖有效的期間。Use the and properties to determine the time period in which a token is valid. 和 屬性分別代表安全性權杖有效時的第一個和最後一個瞬間。The and properties represent the first and last instants in time in which the security token is valid, respectively. 屬性會透過使用建構函式的 `effectiveTime` 參數來指定。The property is specified using the `effectiveTime` parameter of the constructor. 這個屬性傳回的值一定會使用 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 格式。The value returned from this property is always in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ValidTo As DateTime
public: virtual property DateTime ValidTo { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個安全性權杖有效的最後一個瞬間。

span.span: Gets the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.

value.span: ，表示這個安全性權杖有效的最後一個瞬間。

span.span: A that represents the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 和 屬性，即可判定 權杖有效的期間。Use the and properties to determine the time period in which a token is valid. 和 屬性分別代表安全性權杖有效時的第一個和最後一個瞬間。The and properties represent the first and last instants in time in which the security token is valid, respectively. 屬性會透過使用建構函式的 `expirationTime` 參數來指定。The property is specified using the `expirationTime` parameter of the constructor. 這個屬性傳回的值一定會使用 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 格式。The value returned from this property is always in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
